question.content:
You are a FoxMatrix AI Assistant. Your task is to assist users in providing details related to interviews, interviewer, interviewee/candidate, and the feedback of the interviews. As a chatbot, you should focus solely on FoxMatrix interview-related tasks and refrain from providing information outside this domain.
Before providing any answer, it is mandatory to verify all function's description and ask for the required parameters (properties) that user has not provided and are mentioned in the function description one by one only, do not assume or consider it by yourself. 
Please ensure careful consideration of user input and responses as it impacts the business. Additionally, track previous user input to avoid asking the same question again. Your role is crucial in providing interview details. 
Engage users in meaningful conversations, address their queries promptly, and facilitate a seamless interview experience. Your communication style should be friendly and polite meant to answer questions based on a knowledge base. Don't make assumptions about what values to use with functions.
interviewers for python

where_to.description: The location of the desired house, specified in the format 'City, State', such as 'Austin, TX' or 'San Francisco, CA'.

has_laundry_service.description: Indicates whether the house should have a laundry service available.

number_of_adults.description: The number of adults for the reservation. Should be a positive integer.

rating.description: The minimum review rating of the house, on a scale from 1.0 (lowest) to 5.0 (highest).

function.name: Travel_1_FindAttractions
function.description: Browse attractions in a given city, with options to filter by free entry, category, and suitability for children.

location.description: The city or town where the attraction is located, in the format of 'City, State' or 'City, Country', such as 'Paris, France' or 'New York, NY'.

free_entry.description: Indicates whether entrance to the attraction is free. True for free entry, False for paid entry, and a value indicating indifference.

category.description: The category to which the attraction belongs. This parameter helps in refining the search to specific types of attractions.

good_for_kids.description: Indicates whether the attraction is suitable for children. True for suitable, False for not suitable, and a value for no preference.

function.name: Media_3_FindMovies
function.description: Explore a selection of movies online based on specified genre and actors.

genre.description: The genre of the movies to search for.

starring.description: The name of a specific actor or actress to filter the movies by. Use 'Any' for no specific preference.

function.name: Media_3_PlayMovie
function.description: Streams a movie instantly online with the option to select preferred subtitles.

title.description: The title of the movie to be streamed.

subtitle_language.description: The language of the subtitles to accompany the movie.

function.name: Music_3_PlayMedia
function.description: Plays the specified music track on a designated media player device.

track.description: The title of the song to be played.

artist.description: The name of the artist performing the song. If unspecified, any artist will be considered.

device.description: The name of the device or location where the music will be played.

album.description: The name of the album from which the song is taken. If unspecified, any album will be considered.

function.name: Music_3_LookupMusic
function.description: Discover songs that align with your musical preferences by specifying the artist, album, genre, and release year.

artist.description: The name of the artist or band you are interested in. Use 'dontcare' if you have no preference.

album.description: The album title that contains the songs you are looking for. Use 'dontcare' if you have no preference.

genre.description: The music genre of the songs you want to find. Use 'dontcare' to include all genres.

year.description: The year of release for the music you're searching for, formatted as 'YYYY'. Use 'dontcare' if the release year is not a concern.

function.name: Travel_1_FindAttractions
function.description: Browse attractions in a given city, filtering by free entry status, attraction category, and suitability for children.

location.description: The city or town where the attraction is located, in the format of 'City, State' or 'City, Country', such as 'Orlando, FL' or 'Paris, France'.

free_entry.description: Flag indicating whether the entrance to the attraction is free. If set to 'dontcare', it will include all attractions regardless of their entry fee status.

category.description: The category to which the attraction belongs. If set to 'dontcare', it will include attractions from all categories.

good_for_kids.description: Flag indicating whether the attraction is suitable for children. If set to 'dontcare', it will include attractions regardless of their suitability for children.

function.name: Travel_1_FindAttractions
function.description: Browse attractions in a given city, filtering by entry fee, category, and suitability for children.

location.description: The city or town where the attractions are located, in the format of 'City, State' or 'City, Country'. For example, 'San Francisco, CA' or 'Paris, France'.
